rounds.pro_tip: Look at reflections ‚Äî real reflections match the environment, AI reflections are often random.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of an immaculate overhead flat lay of a freshly baked gourmet pizza, perfectly round with vibrant toppings, surrounded by scattered fresh basil leaves, halved cherry tomatoes, olive oil drizzler, and a rustic pizza cutter on a clean slate countertop, shot with a 35mm lens and bright, even studio lighting at f/8.

rounds.attribution: Photo by Nadya Spetnitskaya on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: Natural imperfections like lens flare, slight blur, or uneven lighting are hallmarks of a real photograph.

rounds.attribution: Photo by Quin Engle on Unsplash

Check edges carefully ‚Äî AI often produces halos or unnatural blending where objects meet.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a diverse group of friends sharing laughter and multiple large pizzas around a weathered wooden picnic table on a vibrant outdoor patio during golden hour, with bokeh city lights in the blurred background, captured with a wide-angle 24mm lens.

rounds.pro_tip: Check for symmetry ‚Äî AI tends to make things too perfect and symmetrical.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a stack of warm pizza boxes secured on the passenger seat of a delivery car, viewed from the driver's perspective, with the dashboard visible and blurred city streetlights reflecting softly on the windshield at twilight, captured with a slightly grainy texture and a 16mm ultra-wide lens.

Look for natural imperfections ‚Äî real photos have dust, slight blur, and uneven lighting.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a hand gently pulling a piping hot slice of pepperoni pizza from a fresh pie, capturing the perfect stringy melt of mozzarella cheese, with a shallow depth of field, natural soft window light illuminating the steam, shot with a 50mm prime lens.

rounds.pro_tip: Examine text and labels ‚Äî AI struggles with readable, consistent lettering.
